verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I believe in Jesus,
I believe He is the Son of God;
I believe He died and rose again,
I believe He paid for us all.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And I believe that He's here now, (echo: I believe You're here,)
Standing in our midst;
With the power to heal now, (echo: With the power to heal,)
And the grace to forgive.
